member.name: T:SuxrobGM.Sdk.AspNetCore.TagHelpers.PaginationTagHelper
member.summary: Tag helper to render pagination UI. Requires client-side Bootstrap 4 files to display correctly.

member.name: P:SuxrobGM.Sdk.AspNetCore.TagHelpers.PaginationTagHelper.TotalPages
member.summary: TotalPages - number of pages, default value is 10

member.name: P:SuxrobGM.Sdk.AspNetCore.TagHelpers.PaginationTagHelper.PageIndex
member.summary: PageIndex - number of the current page, default value is 1

member.name: P:SuxrobGM.Sdk.AspNetCore.TagHelpers.PaginationTagHelper.PagePath
member.summary: PagePath - page path, default value is "./Index"

member.name: P:SuxrobGM.Sdk.AspNetCore.TagHelpers.PaginationTagHelper.PageHandler
member.summary: PageHandler - page handler name to pass in query of the URL, default value is "pageIndex"

member.name: P:SuxrobGM.Sdk.AspNetCore.TagHelpers.PaginationTagHelper.PageFragment
member.summary: PageFragment - page fragment name to pass in query of the URL, default value is null
